channel.title: Thanks on Ghostdogs
channel.description: Recent content in Thanks on Ghostdogs

item.title: Week End 15 Nov
item.description: The past week has been a tough week in comparison to the previous week.

item.title: Week ending 8th Nov
item.description: The past week has been a good one. Starting Monday to Friday morning Tam slept exceptionally well for 3 out of the 4 nights. Down early and up early but solid uninterrupted sleep. It was absolutely brilliant. I felt rested, and he looked much more rested.

item.title: Simple things need work
item.description: It is all very easy to take what seem like small things for granted.

item.title: Blown Away
item.description: Tam has just blown me away and made me cry in the best possible way. He walked up to me and signed to me and said out loud - “Tam Love Daddy” 14:30 Sunday 13th October 2019

item.title: Birthdays
item.description: September is a month of birthdays. Bevs on 10th, Mine today 12th, and Tams on 24th. It used to be a fun month, now wrapped in grief.

item.title: Letter to the ones I have lost
item.description: I wrote this ages ago and posted it on a forum about sharing grief. May as well include it here.
